long_answers.question: Long answer question 1 based on Live English!
long_answers.answer: The lesson 'Live English!' focuses on developing presentation skills using PowerPoint. PowerPoint is a powerful tool for sharing information effectively. It helps teachers, students and professionals communicate ideas clearly. The lesson explains step-by-step how to create a slide show. Adding text, pictures and transitions makes presentations attractive. Proper design and layout improve understanding. The lesson also gives tips for effective presentations. Thus, PowerPoint plays an important role in modern communication.
